summary: my that with time will make all artifacts disenchantable
descriptionHtml:
Mikarlarps disenchantable artifacs
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

this mod will make all artifacts in skyrim disenchantable it covers all weapons and amror thus far and here is a list of the weapons 

(plz note that the ones saying (fake)/(real)/(unplayable) is just other versions of the weapon ingame)

Made Disenchantable

Dragonbane
Bloodthorn
Bolar\'s Oathblade
Bow of the Hunt
Chillrend
Dawnbreaker
ebony blade
ebony blade (real)
Ghostblade
Giants Club (unplayable
Halldir\'s Staff
Keening
Mace of molag-bal
Mehrunes\' Razor
nightingale bow
nightingale blade
Red Eagle\'s Bane
Red Eagle\'s Fury
Sanguine Rose
Skull of Corruption
Sild\'s Staff
Spider Control Rod
Spider Control Rod (fake)
Staff of Magnus
Staff of Tandil
The Pale Blade
The Rueful Axe
Trollsbane
Volendrung
Wabbajack
wabbajack (while in pelagius mind)
Windshear


Made enchantable

Blade of sacrifice
Broken Staff
Hjalti\'s Sword
Karliah\'s Bow
Keening (unplayable)
nightingale blade (unplayable)
Rusty Mace (mace of molag bal)
Valdr\'s Lucky Dagger

plz tell me if i missed anything


Sorry but i dindt make a list of the armor made disenchantable but if u find any ive missed ill make sure to fix it

If u liked this mod then try looking at some of my other mods :D
